net.sourceforge.gjtapi.raw.remote
Class RemoteProviderSingleImpl

java.lang.Object

                    |
                    +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.raw.remote.RemoteProviderImpl
                          |
                          +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.raw.remote.RemoteProviderSingleImpl
public class RemoteProviderSingleImpl
extends RemoteProviderImpl

This is a type of RemoteProvider that assumes that only one client will be using it. Therefore Call monitoring stop events are not eaten. Creation date: (2000-06-28 1:19:48)

See Also:

reportCallsOnAddress

public void reportCallsOnAddress(java.lang.String address,
                                 boolean flag)
                          throws javax.telephony.InvalidArgumentException,
                                 javax.telephony.ResourceUnavailableException
Forward the request on to the local RawProvider
Overrides:
reportCallsOnAddress in class RemoteProviderImpl
Tags copied from interface: RemoteProvider
Parameters:
address - The name of the address to change the reporting status on.
flag - true if reporting is to be enabled, false to stop events relating to the call.
Throws:
javax.telephony.InvalidArgumentException - If the address is not known by the telephony provider.
javax.telephony.ResourceUnavailableException - If the provider could not find the reources to report the calls.

                                  javax.telephony.ResourceUnavailableException
Forward the request on to the local RawProvider
Overrides:
reportCallsOnTerminal in class RemoteProviderImpl
Tags copied from interface: RemoteProvider
Parameters:
address - The name of the terminal to change the reporting status on.
flag - true if reporting is to be enabled, false to stop events relating to the call.
Returns:
true if the terminal is known, false otherwise
Throws:
javax.telephony.InvalidArgumentException - If the terminal is not known by the telephony provider.
javax.telephony.ResourceUnavailableException - If the reporting could not be started due to resource constraints.

stopReportingCall

public boolean stopReportingCall(SerializableCallId call)
Forward request to the local TelephonyProvider

Since we assume only one Framework is using us, it is safe to stop reporting on this call.

Overrides:
stopReportingCall in class RemoteProviderImpl
Tags copied from interface: RemoteProvider
Parameters:
call - The handle on the call to turn state change reporting off for.
Returns:
true if the call is known, false otherwise
